Boost your Amazon business with UnieLogics, a powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline your product research and logistics process.  UnieLogics equips you with the tools you need to find winning products, analyze competition, and optimize your listings, all without the need for expensive software or juggling multiple tools.

For Amazon sellers, our extension is packed with automations to streamline synchronization of shipment data between our platform and Amazon's.

----------------------UnieLogics offers a comprehensive suite of features, including:

-Bulk Product Research: Analyze product data in bulk, including titles, brands, categories, and more. Our proprietary algorithm helps you identify profitable opportunities within your niche.

-In-Depth Product Analysis: Gain valuable insights with our intuitive product analysis tool. See historical trends, pricing fluctuations, BSR data, and seller information, all presented in clear, Keepa-like charts.

-Risk Identification: Avoid costly mistakes with infringement (IP) violation warnings, Hazmat product identification, and restricted brand flags.

-Earnings Calculator: Easily visualize potential product profitability with our world-class earnings calculator.

----------------------UnieLogics goes beyond product research, offering:

-On-Demand Logistics (Beta): Connect with warehouses in key markets around the United States, optimizing your receiving and shipment costs without contracts, hidden fees or minimum order quantity.

-Centralized Operations: The extension seamlessly connects to your dashboard at https://unielogics.com, centralizing your product research, operations, and shipment planning for maximum efficiency.

-Supplier Management: Create and connect products to suppliers directly from the extension. This streamlines your purchasing workflow and keeps everything organized within the UnieLogics platform.

----------------------Ready to take your Amazon business to the next level?

Start your 7-day free trial today and experience the UnieLogics difference!

----------------------Key Benefits:

-Find profitable products faster
-Analyze products directly on Amazon.com
-Identify trends and make data-driven decisions
-Minimize losses with enhanced Keepa-like charts
-Calculate potential earnings with ease
-Gain clarity on Buy Box competition
-Download searches for further analysis
-Save favorite products for easy reference

JOIN OUR BETA PROGRAM TODAY! 

----------------------Please Note:

UnieLogics currently works with the USA marketplace only.
A visit to https://www.unielogics.com/login is required for initial setup and data communication.
An Amazon Seller Central account is needed to utilize the live API data showcased through the Tunnel Vision feature.
UnieLogics - Your one-stop shop for simplified and successful Amazon product research!
